system.requirement: After you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.725a21e2f02d7e12]{Fulfill Your Vow} to be found worthy of Laevateinn, quest to find it, and wield it...

abilities.description: You may @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} +wits in melee or from a distance with this staff. If you do, it inflicts 1 harm as a blast of Laevateinn's necrotic energy saps the life of your foe. If your action die shows a 6, inflict an additional +1 harm.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} +wits by unleashing a mystic burst from Laevateinn, envision how the power of death hinders others or affects the environment. Then, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger} +wits against a horror or servant of the dead leveraging Laevateinn's power over such creatures, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
